strings.ES_KEYWORD_ENHANCING: <style=cKeywordName>Overloading</style><style=cSub>Consumes all charges on use but becomes stronger for each charge consumed</style>
strings.ES_KEYWORD_MARKING: <style=cKeywordName>Tracking</style><style=cSub>Slows enemies and increases damage towards them</style>
strings.ES_KEYWORD_ADAPTIVE: <style=cKeywordName>Unyielding</style><style=cSub>Knockback immunity and incoming instances of damage are limited to 20% of max health</style>
